  index: "my-index-000001",
  settings: {
    analysis: {
      analyzer: {
        en: {
          tokenizer: "standard",
          filter: ["my_en_US_dict_stemmer"],

      },

        my_en_US_dict_stemmer: {
          type: "hunspell",

        },
      },

  },
});
